body_html:
@onlyak
What related GitHub issues or StackOverflow threads have you found by searching the web for your problem?
tensorflow/models#2246

Environment info

Environment:
Ubuntu 16.04
CUDA 8.0 and 6.0, TF 1.4.0, Python 3.5

I am using conda virtual environment, below are my paths from the bashrc file:
#added by me for protobuf
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:pwd:pwd/slim

#To the Ob folder
export MODELS=/home/hamza/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/models/research
export PYTHONPATH=$MODELS:$MODELS/slim
export OBJ_DET=$MODELS/object_detection

#further i add for the custom training of mobilenet
export PYTHONPATH=$OBJ_DET
export PYTHONPATH=$OBJ_DET/training

Errors are the follow:

when i enter the command
python3 train.py --logtostderr --train_dir=training/ --pipeline_config_path=~/Desktop/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config

or

python $OBJ_DET/train.py --logtostderr --train_dir=training --pipeline_config_path=training/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config
i get the following error:

tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: ~/Desktop/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config; No such file or directory

the file ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config is in training folder

body:
@onlyak 
**What related GitHub issues or StackOverflow threads have you found by searching the web for your problem?**
https://github.com/tensorflow/models/issues/2246

**Environment info**

Environment:
Ubuntu 16.04
CUDA 8.0 and 6.0, TF 1.4.0, Python 3.5

I am using conda virtual environment, below are my paths from the bashrc file:
#added by me for protobuf
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:`pwd`:`pwd`/slim

#To the Ob folder 
export MODELS=/home/hamza/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow/models/research
export PYTHONPATH=$MODELS:$MODELS/slim
export OBJ_DET=$MODELS/object_detection

#further i add for the custom training of mobilenet
export PYTHONPATH=$OBJ_DET
export PYTHONPATH=$OBJ_DET/training


Errors are the follow:

when i enter the command
python3 train.py --logtostderr --train_dir=training/ --pipeline_config_path=~/Desktop/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config

or 

python $OBJ_DET/train.py --logtostderr --train_dir=training --pipeline_config_path=training/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config
i get the following error:

tensorflow.python.framework.errors_impl.NotFoundError: ~/Desktop/ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config; No such file or directory

the file ssd_mobilenet_v1_pets.config is in training folder
